ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: Since it was an off topic subject, why not keep it going off topic! I am very intersted in knowing what this staff does or is like.  I know there is a skull
ygData.messageBody:
Since it was an off topic subject, why not keep it
going off topic!

I am very intersted in knowing what this staff does or
is like. I know there is a skull that you can obtain
for a quest that has two open slots in it, where you
can place them in the skull and hit combine. Now, I
assume the quest is for the ruby eyes and I forget
what and who it is for. However, wouldn't it be nice
if you could place the two staff parts into the slots
and combine to make a staff of discord? That's just a
high hope.

Would the staff of discord be "tinkered" or "smithed"?
Most weapons are smithed, and tinkering is competely
un-finished and bugged. So it is hard to say.

-Kryogen

--- mstokes <mstokes@...> wrote:
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> First the King of Akanon is a Gnomish Enchanter. He
> usually has the human
> illusion spell active. Second, While I haven't yet
> obtained the staff of
> writhing, I do have its stats. Hmmm must be at
> home. Well I can't remember
> damage/delay but the effect is "casts chaotic
> feedback". This is NOT the staff
> of the Priest of Discord. He carries the Staff of
> Discord.
>
>
>
